0.1.8.en:
added option `Protect self-set names from being overwritten by the adapter` ([#76](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/76))
allow multiple AdminTabs for multiple instances ([#88](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/88))
fixed password with special characters ([#35](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/35))
fixed incorrect handling of zeroing of `yield*` data points by OpenDTU ([#96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96))
remove zeroing of `yield*` data points by this adapter ([#96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96))
0.1.8.de:
`Protect self-set names from being overwritten by the adapter` #[76](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/76)
mehrere AdminTabs für mehrere Instanzen #[88](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/88)
festes Passwort mit Sonderzeichen #[35](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/35)
unrichtige Handhabung des Nullens von Ertrag*-Datenpunkten durch OpenDTU #[96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96)
löschen von Ertrags-*-Datenpunkten durch diesen Adapter #[96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96)
0.1.8.ru:
добавлена опция `Protect self-set имена от overwritten by the Adapter` #[76](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/76)
разрешить несколько AdminTabs для нескольких экземпляров #[88](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/88)
фиксированный пароль со специальными символами #[35](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/35)
некорректная обработка нуля доходности* пунктов данных OpenDTU #[96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96)
удалить нулевую доходность* точки данных этого адаптера #[96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96)
0.1.8.pt:
opção adicionada `Protect auto-ajustar nomes de ser substituído pelo adaptador` #[76](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/76)
permitir múltiplos AdminTabs para múltiplas instâncias #[88](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/88)
senha fixa com caracteres especiais #[35](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/35)
manuseio incorreto fixo de zero dos pontos de dados do rendimento* pela OpenDTU #[96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96)
remover zero de pontos de dados de rendimento* por este adaptador #[96](https://github.com/o0shojo0o/ioBroker.opendtu/issues/96)
0.1.8.nl:
voegde optie 'Protect zelfverzekerde namen toe van overschreven worden door de adapter' technieken
quality over Quantity (QoQ) Releases Vertaling:
gerepareerd wachtwoord met speciale personages £35, htub.com/oshojoo/ioBroker
